Publication Title: Tumor nano-lysate activates dendritic cells to evoke a preventative immune response
Publication Authors: Jenna A Dombroski, Abigail R Fabiano, Samantha V Knoblauch, Schyler J Rowland, Katherine N Gibson-Corley, Michael R King
Publication Abstract: A tumor nano-lysate "TNL" vaccine comprised of sonicated 4T1 cells was developed, characterized and implemented for the prevention of triple-negative breast cancer. This study aimed to gain a better understanding of the immune response behind the success of the vaccine in vivo, through use of ex vivo and in vivo assays. Publication Title: Fluid shear stress enhances dendritic cell activation
Publication Keywords: Dendritic cells, fluid shear stress, Cancer Immunotherapy
Publication Authors: Jenna A Dombroski, Schyler J Rowland, Abigail R Fabiano, Samantha V Knoblauch, Jacob M Hope, Michael R King
Publication Abstract: Ex vivo activation of dendritic cells (DCs) has been widely explored for targeted therapies, although these treatments remain expensive. Reducing treatment costs while enhancing cell activation could help to make immunotherapies more accessible.
